name: iOSCertInstall
description: Install iOS certificates to the default keychain or a temporary keychain.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: certificate
inputs.label: iOS Certificate (.p12)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Install the iOS certificates with name matching the specified value. By default the certificate will be installed into a temporary keychain accessible via the variable `IOS_TEMP_KEYCHAIN` during the build.

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: P12 Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password associated with your iOS certificate.
